article_title: Aaron Harber interviews Diane Carman – The Denver Post
article_text: A 54-year-old Fountain woman was cited on Tuesday for utility meter tampering after police responded to a tip and found spliced wiring that fed a legal marijuana grow operation, authorities said. Police received an anonymous tip from a neighbor who saw electrical items being hooked up to the house in a way that did not look up to utility code,...
